attributes.action: Ensure that Bryan Robson stays as Sheffield United Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the esteem that Mr Bryan Robson is held in two thirds of the footballing city of Sheffield, so clearly demonstrated during the recent  Sheffield derby when his name rang out from 3 sides of Hillsborough stadium, it is imperative that his current employment status is maintained and he is given sufficient time to return Sheffield United to their rightful place.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
